member.name: M:de.pta.Component.Logging.Log4NetWrapper.Logger.GetApplicationPath
member.summary: Returns the base directory for the application. Usually this is the directory where the .exe file of the application is stored.
member.remarks: The XML configuration file for the application is stored in a subdirectory named "Configuration" below the application root directory. The root directory differs if the application is started from Visual Studio .NET (it's the \bin\Debug or \bin\Release directory. This method strips the "\bin..." part of the application root directory so that the position of the "Configuration" directory can be the same for production and development environment
